title: A new era of Domination & Combat begins. Live the OMEX standard, an intense experience on FiveM.
weAre: We are an experience that goes beyond just a server of PvP. We are a community that is dedicated to providing an intense and competitive experience. Face other players in exciting game modes, like Domination or Confrontation, climb the Bronze ranks all the way to Omega and show your skill in each match. Here, each kill counts, each objective is crucial, and each victory brings you closer to the top. Without limits, the challenge is out there: Are you ready to become a legend in OMEX?
